original_text: When Samuel heard all that the people said, he repeated it before the Lord.
korean_text: 사무엘이 백성의 말을 다 듣고 여호와께 아뢰매

sentences.original_text: When Samuel heard all that the people said
sentences.korean_translation: 사무엘이 백성이 말하는 모든 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: he repeated it before the Lord
